description:
The terrible history of Sanji`s family continue to unfold. From a rare moment of compassion he is able to escape, only to face his father`s cruelty before setting out on his own.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Auf zum East Blue! – Sanjis entschlossener Aufbruch!
East Blue e: Sanji Ketsui no Funade
To the East Blue! Sanji`s Resolute Departure!
Vers East Blue. Le départ affirmé de Sanji
إلى الأزرق الشّرقيّ! رحيل سانجي العازم!
東の海[イーストブルー]へ サンジ決意の船出
